subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: The GTools plugin allows to include in the pages of the site elements intended for Google services such as:
This plugin can be used from version 4.1 of Lutece. For previous versions of Lutece, the ganalytics plugin can be used for the Google Analytics part.

subsection.name: Template Settings
subsection.p:
For Google Analytics, add the bookmark google_analytics
in the page template (page_frameset.html) or footer (footer.html)

For site verification, add the bookmark google_meta_site_verification
in the head part of the page (header.html and header_home.html),

subsection.name: Google Variables Administration
subsection.p: The management of Google variables (GA code, key, ...) are directly accessible in the "Managing site properties" section of the back office.
